title: 101: Episode #101: Streaming Spoilers
itunes:title: Episode #101: Streaming Spoilers
description:
• At 4:30 AM, we have all officially finished ‘Deathly Hallows’
  • SPOILER SPOILER SPOILER!
  • We go all around the table sharing general opinions.
  • Everyone agrees that Dumbledore was amazing.
  • What are the differences in good vs. evil between Hallows and Horcruxes?
  • We discuss the strong political themes in this book.
  • ‘STAY AWAY FROM MY DAUGHTER YOU B****!’
  • Were the deaths necessary? We’re split in opinion.
  • Which character experienced magic late in life?
  • How innocent or guilty was Dumbledore’s father for attacking Muggles?
  • Where was the Department of Mysteries?
  • How was Ron able to speak Parseltongue?
  • The Epilogue.
itunes:author: Harry Potter
dc:creator: Harry Potter
